settings.heading: Our Methodology
settings.description:
At MerchGlobal we focus on strategy, creativity, and results,
driving a tangible return on investment for our clients. The ability to create brand engagement determines an organizationâs success. 
Our simple streamlined process removes complexities while focusing on creativity to deliver that engagement.

We Created MerchGlobal To Revolutionize Branded 
Merchandise And Uniform Programs
settings.description: We think in terms of strategy, results, and return on investment. Right from the start, we ask enough questions to fully understand your business goals, and then translate that into an individually tailored solution that is as unique as your business.

settings.heading: Absolutely Guaranteed
settings.cofoundertext: Not satisfied? We'll make it right.

settings.cofoundertext:
Stay a step above the rest with custom branded merchandise design. Our experts make your corporate visions come to life
with memorable hoodies', t-shirts', hats', bags' designs. Weâll get you dressed in style and deliver impact and engagement
through creative merchandise and uniforms that people actually want.

settings.heading1: T-Shirt Design
settings.cofoundertext1:
Custom t-shirts will never go out of style!
Weâll have your business imagery looking sharp and vibrant with an artistic design that will hold strong and impressive for years to come.

settings.heading1: Hoodie Design

The possible hoodie designs are endless.
Our experts will find the creative design direction for your custom hoodie to create the emotion, the commitment, and the loyalty to your brand.

settings.heading1: Headwear Design

settings.heading1: Merchandise Design
settings.cofoundertext1: Weâll help you design and decorate a variety of promotional merchandise, so you have the greatest chance of being noticed and coveted. Letâs connect you with your target audience.

settings.heading1: Let's Make Your Merch You!
settings.cofoundertext1: Get in touch today to discuss your merch.

settings.heading: Embroidery
settings.heading1:
Embroidery is a great and popular technique that's used because of its versatility and suitability to all fabrics. From corporate clothing to uniforms, it will always have a very vibrant and professional appearance to elevate your brand. Our embroidery specialists use the most advanced techniques and quality materials, so your items have lasting power and perfect stitch consistency every time.

With our embroidery work, we guarantee:
settings.cofoundertext2:
• A high-quality finish
  • A stylish and refined look, with colours that catch the eye
  • Clarity and readability, durable outcome
  • Custom placement options

settings.heading: 3DX
settings.heading1:
DTG is an inkjet technology that can print very high-quality, full-colour, photographic prints directly onto a t-shirt. DTG Printing is best suited for designs or artwork considered too complex for other printing techniques, like screen printing, for instance, which is best suited for designs with few colours. DTG printing machines have a huge colour mixing potential allowing them to print even the tiniest details.

The advantages of Direct-to-Garment printing:
settings.cofoundertext2:
• A soft, flexible, and comfy finish
  • Application potential for most fabrics
  • Perfect readability of complex and detailed designs
  • Photorealistic pictures

settings.heading: FusionX
settings.heading1:
Exclusive to MerchGlobal, FusionX is a cutting-edge decoration method where any artwork can be applied to the transfer paper, which is then placed onto the fabric. Using a heat press machine, the desired graphic is transferred and incorporated directly into the fabric particles of the garment, making this printing method a long-lasting one.

This printing offers:
settings.cofoundertext2:
• A stable, permanent design that won't crack, fade, or peel
  • A soft and breathable finish
  • Full coloured designs

settings.heading: Screen Print
settings.heading1:
Screen printing is the most suitable option for large orders, as the application process is tedious and personalized to each order. Thick ink is applied through a stencil to the fabric to create the desired design or image. This special ink sits on top of the fabric and dries to become one with it. It's typically used for simple logos and designs with small palettes and large orders.

The screen printing decoration technique produces:
settings.cofoundertext2:
• Vibrant, bold images
  • Maximum durability
  • Perfect designs on a variety of fabrics
  • Designs with a moderate amount of colors
  • Fast production

settings.heading: Laser Engraving
settings.heading1: The process of laser etching is when a laser burns away a portion of the fabric that the wanted design is being placed onto.
settings.cofoundertext2:
• Can go over plackets, zippers
  • Works on different fabrics, the best fabrics to use are fleece, napped fabrics, denim, microfiber poly and silk, and polyester performance wear
  • Fabrics like terry cloth and plush materials should be avoided
  • Mid-tone colors really make the images pop
  • On black or white fabric, it will end up looking almost like a hologram

settings.heading: AppliquÃ©
settings.heading1:
If you're leaning towards an embroidered custom design or logo for your corporate promotional merch, consider elevating it to the appliquÃ© decoration method. This embroidery technique uses both artistic stitchwork and patchwork to create textured and ornamental designs. It is a complex method but is worth the extra commitment. Full-colour designs and lettering can be achieved with laser appliquÃ© and they'll stand out in the crowd.

It's great for:
settings.cofoundertext2:
• Big central logos (like the ones on college sweatshirts)
  • A multi-dimensional design with texture and patterns
  • Fabrics whose heaviness is compatible with the decoration (leather, fleece, cotton, flannel, etc)
  • Bold, noticeable images

settings.heading: Leather Patch
settings.heading1:
Various types of attachable options exist for custom garment decoration. Designs can be printed, embroidered, lasered, or woven into a cloth patch which can then be attached in various ways to the chosen garments. These patches typically carry a brand name and logo and are often worn on the sleeve or chest. They are great for uniforms as 'skill patches', like those worn by the army, scouts, or police.

The advantages of patches:
settings.cofoundertext2:
• They can be applied to any fabric
  • They can be glued or sewn on
  • Size, color, and location is customizable
  • They don't permanently alter the original garment if they need to be transferred

settings.heading: What Is A Company Store With Merch-On-Demand<sup><small>TM</small></sup>?
settings.cofoundertext:
We bring you the solution of having your own full collection of branded merchandise with no need to commit to inventory.
Engage your staff with on-trend company branded apparel, support your sales teams with the client gifts they need,
all without the guesswork and risks of committing to stock upfront.

settings.heading: One Platform. One Journey
settings.btntxt:
MerchCentreTM, our company store software, brings you the control and insight you require to run your programs effectively and efficiently.

MerchCentreTM revolutionizes managing merchandise budgets and product allocations across different users, departments, divisions, and even countries. MerchCentreTM allows you to set different admin and product access levels to determine who can access what. MerchCentreTM does so much moreâ¦. and above all is customizable to your special and unique requirements designed to put you in control!
settings.btntxt2:
A sophisticated, highly flexible, cloud-based solution that is simple to use is no longer a paradox!

User intuitive and easy to understand, enjoy the time you save having a solution that streamlines this part of their job! From simply redeeming your uniform allocation, ordering the products you need for your next event, to managing the integrated complexities of the full merchandise and uniform program, MerchCentreTM is designed with your ease in mind!
settings.btntxt3:
Knowledge is power, MerchCentreTM provides you with the intelligence and detailed reporting capabilities you need.

With a wide variety of key reports available at any time, combined with the ability to create exactly the custom report you need MerchCentreTM has positioned you to be the hero!

settings.heading:
Manage Merchandise & Uniforms
With Your Custom Company Store
Advantages Of Having A Company Store With Merch-On-Demand<sup><small>TM</small></sup>
settings.cofoundertext:
If you value efficiency, quality, and consistency in your branding and marketing projects,
setting up an online company store or an employee program might be the single solution
that will solve multiple problems in your organization.
settings.btntxt1:
Normally an online company store means either longer lead times or having inventory with all itâs known challenges. With Merch-On-DemandTM we remove the risks!

No inventory | No obsolete stock | No storage fees
settings.btntxt3: We have the capacity to take your individual request for branded apparel and logo them one at a time on-demand. This solution provides your brand with a made to order collection that is available 24/7.
settings.btntxt5: No one wants to wait four weeks for their order thatâs why Merch-On-Demand<sup><small>TM</small></sup> is designed around speed and the ability to ship next day.

settings.heading: Company Store For Different Applications
settings.btntxt: Streamline your purchasing of branded apparel, uniforms and hats.
settings.btntxt2: Motivate, reward and incentivize your employees, customers and distributors.
settings.btntxt3: Create an opportunity for personnel to wear your brand with pride at the workplace as well as outside of work.
settings.btntxt4: Encourage regional advertising, increase market penetration and sales at the dealer level while maintaining a consistent marketing strategy.
settings.btntxt5: Find more than 5,000 merchandise items that provide you with instant ideas on how to stand out from the crowd and raise your brand image.
settings.btntxt6: Think about customized gifts where you can add your personal touch and put humanity into the client-company-employee relationship.

settings.heading: Services
settings.heading1: Make It Your Own
settings.heading1234: Personalized promotional merchandise means you're in charge of customizing any detail you want; from neck taping and neck labelling to hangtag and woven label. Our vast selection of premium quality apparel is waiting for you to turn into your logo branded merchandise, so you can engage your staff and clients with trendy custom merch.

settings.heading1: Creative Design
settings.heading1234: Our design team makes it easy for you to build your brand with stylish, memorable designs that unlock the true potential of your brand. Understanding uniforms and merchandise, we constantly push boundaries to imagine new creative ways to capture the power of your brand. Your logo will be looking its best once we've applied our custom, artful touch!

settings.heading1: Decoration
settings.heading1234: From t-shirts to ball caps, to hoodies, we've got tons of items ready to decorate with your corporate logo with the most popular decorating techniques around. We carry embroidery, digital DTG, transfer and screen printing, applique, and other printing methods. Choose between our many decoration types to get the exact results you're looking for.

settings.heading1: Company Stores
settings.heading1234: Get the control and analytics you require over your entire merchandise and uniform programs. Manage everything from your logos and print material to your branded merch inventory levels and budgets, all in one central place; an online company store.

settings.heading: FusionX
settings.heading1:
Exclusive to MerchGlobal, FusionX is a cutting-edge decoration method where any artwork can be applied to the transfer paper, which is then placed onto the fabric. Using a heat press machine, the desired graphic is transferred and incorporated directly into the fabric particles of the garment, making this printing method a long-lasting one.

This printing offers:
settings.cofoundertext2:
• A stable, permanent design that won't crack, fade, or peel
  • A soft and breathable finish
  • Full coloured designs

settings.heading: 3DX
settings.heading1:
For a head-turning logo, 3XD is the method to implement. It's the process of rendering a company logo into a 3D clothing decoration. First, the design is digitally processed and innovated to be more dimensional in composition, then further consultation establishes color and finish customizations, and finally, it's transformed into a physical patch that pops and is imprinted into/onto the garment!

With our 3DX clothing decoration methods, we guarantee:
settings.cofoundertext2:
• Durable patches with lasting adhesive
  • Textured and dimensional logos
  • Choices of finishes (standard, textured, specialty, or metallic)
  • Tons of palette options

settings.heading: Leather Patch
settings.heading1:
Our leather patches come in all shapes and sizes and are highly customizable. Based on preference, a base material (genuine or synthetic leather) and hue are chosen. The logo can then be printed, debossed, or embossed (inverted) into the patch for a flat or dimensional texture in a variety of colors. This process is done using screen/UV printing with ink or laser etching/carving out the material itself. Finishing details like subtle stitching can then be added.
Leather provides luxurious and rugged originality to any garment while remaining sturdy. Our synthetic bases are water-resistant and indistinguishable from genuine leather. Both can be embroidered into garments or heat-pressed on.

Our leather patches will be:
settings.cofoundertext2:
• Long-lasting and tough
  • Top quality materials
  • Easily customizable (leather color, logo color and design, stitching, imprinting style, 3D or flat, size, and attachment)
  • A contrasting design that pops
  • Artfully executed

settings.heading: Crests
settings.heading1:
Crests, much like emblems and patches, can be designed with a variety of methods. Most use an AppliquÃ©/hybrid method, such as embroidery/Merrow bordering on twill cutouts. Often pieces of twill and polyester are layered and sewn together to make the logo and then finished with some embroidery to add dimension and texture to the design composition.
Crest designs can also be printed directly onto the clothing, glued/heat-pressed on as contoured additions, or sewn on. Another method that may be implemented for precise and vibrant images is the dye sublimation/heat transfer printing method, where special digitized dyes can permanently alter the fabric color of the crest patch through heat transfer.

Our crests, no matter the composition, will always be:
settings.cofoundertext2:
• Refined and precise
  • Widely customizable (styles, colors, designs, textures, size, attachment, material/dye, etc)
  • Eye-catching
  • Expertly crafted and applied
  • Perfectly you!
